description: Whether it's a multi-day adventure friends or a weekend around town with the family, the lightweight Guides Down Hoody will keep you comfortable even when the temperature drops. Its 700-fill-power down ensures you stay warm. VELCRO® cuffs and elasticized drawcord hem ensure a secure fit and help block the elements. The two-way zipper means you'll be comfortable whether standing or seated. Hand, chest, and interior pockets help keep items accessible and secure.
name: Marmot Guides Down Hoody - Mens
